original_title: The C Vibes Club Tour is back to rock Colombo
original_body_lines: Two international DJs and Colombo’s best will rock 10 venues over 10 days when the C Vibes Club Tour 2023 takes off on the 22nd of June and rocks on until the 2nd of July. These are set to probably be the best nights out, which you don’t want to miss out!
The tour will be headlined by two premier female DJs from the European club circuit Aya and Anna, ably supported Sri Lanka’s star DJs Ace, Trev D, Inirah, Iman and Wendell.

DJ Aya who hails from Romania creates some great vibes with her House, Dance, Hip-hop & R&B spins, having shared the stage with the likes of Amin Van, Martin Garrix and David Guetta. Her repertoire at numerous clubs, stages and festivals including opening the main stage of UNTOLD, SAGA, Flight and Take Off Festivals as well as the Sibiu Festival have earned her an ardent following of over 20,000. She won the International DJ Contest in 2020 hosted by MixMash Records and Laidback Luke and is Brand Ambassador for Denon DJ. She has a buzzing music career both as a producer and remixer, having remixed records for David Guetta, 50 Cent, Sean Paul, Missy Elliot and Acraze among a host of top names in the industry.
Austrian DJ Anna has also released songs with Universal Music

Austrian DJ Anna is not just amazing at spinning her music of Techno, House, Dance, Hip-hop and Techno prompting a following of nearly 32,000 and over 10,000 TikTok streams, she is also the Brand Ambassador for L’Oreal, Universal Studios and Sol Vienna. She is known for her amazing speaking skills which gets the floor into an energetic party mode. She has released songs under Universal Music including Pizza which had millions of streams.

The C Vibes Club Tour 2023, with partners YES FM and Cinnamon Grand will take on the most happening clubs in Colombo with the opening event at Sequel, followed by Industri, Breeze Bar & Kava, Travelling Bruncher, Love Bar, Re.Pub.Lk, Botanik, Rodeo and Disques. So get your groove on and be a part of the best nights out, probably!
